docs.lead_paragraph: Same-sex marriage will be banned in 15 states at most if the Supreme Court takes up the question this term or next. That could be an important number.
docs.snippet: Same-sex marriage will be banned in 15 states at most if the Supreme Court takes up the question this term or next. That could be an important number....
docs.abstract: Adam Liptak Sidebar column; fact that same-sex marriage will be banned in up to 15 states, at most, should Supreme Court take up question this term offers hint that justices may rule in favor of practice; legal experts note that historically Supreme Court has passed measures after only a third of states still retain ban against them.

headline.main: In Same-Sex Marriage Calculation, Justices May See Golden Ratio
headline.print_headline: In Same-Sex Marriage Calculation, Justices May See Golden Ratio

docs.lead_paragraph: Under pressure from President Barack Obama, Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel submitted his resignation Monday amid White House concerns about his effectiveness and broader criticism from outside about the administration's Middle East crisis management.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel’s passivity and lack of support in President Obama’s inner circle proved too much for an administration that found itself back on a war footing.
docs.snippet: Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel’s passivity and lack of support in President Obama’s inner circle proved too much for an administration that found itself back on a war footing....
docs.abstract: Defense Sec Chuck Hagel resigns under pressure from Pres Obama after weeks of rising tension over variety of issues, including delays in Guantanamo Bay detainee transfers; move is striking reversal for Obama, who chose Hagel in 2012, but who has now decided to shake up his national security team in face of escalating conflicts.

headline.print_headline: Defense Chief to Step Down as Crises Rise
headline.sub: Obama Dissatisfied, Officials Say, Amid Global Crises
headline.main: Hagel Resigns Under Pressure as Global Crises Test Pentagon

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: The Affordable Care Act faces grave danger because legislative repair work that was once routine has grown impossible.
docs.snippet: The Affordable Care Act faces grave danger because legislative repair work that was once routine has grown impossible....
docs.abstract: Political Memo; swift passage of 1997 Welfare Reform Technical Corrections Act underscores deteriorating conditions in current national politics, particularly when compared with debate surrounding Affordable Care Act; health care reform law faces grave danger before Supreme Court because same legislative repair work that was used to iron out welfare reform is impossible due, in part, to fundamentally different partisan backdrops and Republican Party's right-ward shift.

headline.main: In Partisan Washington, Health Law Faces Grave Legal Technicalities
headline.print_headline: In Cooperation’s Absence, a Phrase Yields a Supreme Court Case

docs.lead_paragraph: The struggling chain recruited 100 prominent authors, including Donna Tartt, David Mitchell and Dan Brown, to each autograph about 5,000 copies of their latest books, which will be on sale at its stores nationwide.
docs.snippet: The struggling chain recruited 100 prominent authors, including Donna Tartt, David Mitchell and Dan Brown, to each autograph about 5,000 copies of their latest books, which will be on sale at its stores nationwide....
docs.abstract: Barnes & Noble has recruited 100 prominent authors to each sign roughly 5,000 copies of their latest books, hoping to draw customers into stores on Black Friday; drawing customers into physical stores has become urgent priority for chain as it has been battered by competition from Amazon and by sluggish book market.

headline.print_headline: Authors Sign Up to Raise Barnes & Noble’s Sales
headline.main: Authors Sign Up to Raise Barnes & Noble’s Black Friday Sales
